description.value:
When found, it held 5 cloth bandages and enough powder to cover them all thoroughly. Currently:

- 5 bandages
- All the powder.

gm-notes.notes:
The bag started with 5 bandages and 10 doses of powder.

When **wine or water is added** to the green powder, it forms a poultice that heals [[/r 1d4+1]] hp of damage. 

Any **healer, herbalist, shaman, or cleric** can readily identify the powder.
